TopicTitle: What planet should I do next?

Articles.Content:
I know it's a little early, but what planet do you think I should cover once I've finished The Moho Expedition?

Edited October 26, 2017 by The_Cat_In_Space

Try sending a multi-purpose mission to Eve, able to get science from orbit, in the atmosphere, and on the surface. Maybe it would be a large unmanned craft with at least one probe lander attached to it. The main craft would get low and high-space gravitational measurements of the entire planet, while the probes record atmospheric data and get science from different biomes. You don't have to do something like this, but this is one mission idea I'm planning on doing soon-ish.
Definitely Laythe, because it's hands down the most interesting destination. Or, even better, do the entire Jool system. That place is so much fun.
Balloon mission to Eve atmosphere.  Use KAS tethers to lower a capsule to the surface.
